parameter: # Feature Engineering Parameters - DISABLED to prevent overfitting

description: Maximum lag periods for annual time series features (disabled)
Rolling window sizes for annual moving averages (disabled)

parameter: # XGBoost Parameters - Ultra-conservative for small dataset

description: Learning rate (high for very few trees)
Minimum sum of instance weight in child (very high)
Number of parallel threads for XGBoost

parameter: # Random Forest Parameters - Simplified for small dataset

description: Number of parallel threads for Random Forest
Input sequence length for annual data

parameter: # Ensemble Parameters - Two model ensemble (XGB + RF only)
# Uncertainty Quantification Parameters - Reduced for faster training

description: Maximum CPU threads to use (leave 2 for system)
